attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How much does each set of traffic lights cost and how many are not needed,Just  count a few sets  and multiply them nationwide,an absolute fortune, Getting rid of   stupidly placed traffic lights would free up traffic and ease congestion, My  own point of view is that everywhere has been littered with traffic lights to cause congestion, they then have an excuse to bring in a congestion charge.

rejection.details: you need to add a proper title - not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
